Posts.EditableText: I keep running into a problem where the game freezes up randomly when I enter a command. Sometimes it just waits a few seconds then responds, but sometimes it freezes indefinitely and I have to reload the game. This isn't specific to any one game; it has happened in every one I've played. Is there anything that can be done about this?

Posts.EditableText: If you're using the web player, it's probably because the server is overloaded, or your connection isn't too stable. Sadly there's not much we can do about that.
